trans-unit.source: Row number(s) to use as the column names, and the start of the data. Default behavior is to infer the column names: if no names are passed the behavior is identical to header=0 and column names are inferred from the first line of the file, if column names are passed explicitly then the behavior is identical to header=None. Explicitly pass header=0 to be able to replace existing names.
trans-unit.target: 行号（用作列名）以及数据的开头。默认行为是推断列名：如果未传递名称，则行为与 header=0 相同，并且从文件的第一行推断出列名；如果显式传递列名，则该行为与 header=None 相同。。显式传递 header=0 以便能够替换现有名称。

trans-unit.source: Row number(s) to use as the column names, and the start of the data. Default behavior is to infer the column names: if no names are passed the behavior is identical to header=0 and column names are inferred from the first line of the file, if column names are passed explicitly then the behavior is identical to header=None. Explicitly pass header=0 to be able to replace existing names. The header can be a list of integers that specify row locations for a multi-index on the columns e.g. [0,1,3]. Intervening rows that are not specified will be skipped (e.g. 2 in this example is skipped). Note that this parameter ignores commented lines and empty lines if skip_blank_lines=True, so header=0 denotes the first line of data rather than the first line of the file.
trans-unit.target: 行号（用作列名）以及数据的开头。默认行为是推断列名：如果未传递名称，则行为与 header=0 相同，并且从文件的第一行推断出列名；如果显式传递列名，则该行为与 header=None 相同。。显式传递 header=0 以便能够替换现有名称。标头可以是整数列表，这些整数指定列中多个索引的行位置，例如[0,1,3]。未指定的中间行将被跳过（例如，在此示例中为2）。请注意，如果 skip_blank_lines=True ，则此参数将忽略注释行和空行，因此 header=0 表示数据的第一行而不是文件的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Seaborn is a Python visualization library based on matplotlib. It provides a high-level, dataset-oriented interface for creating attractive statistical graphics. The plotting functions in seaborn understand pandas objects and leverage pandas grouping operations internally to support concise specification of complex visualizations. Seaborn also goes beyond matplotlib and pandas with the option to perform statistical estimation while plotting, aggregating across observations and visualizing the fit of statistical models to emphasize patterns in a dataset.
trans-unit.target: Seaborn是基于matplotlib的Python可视化库。它提供了一个面向数据集的高级界面，可用于创建引人入胜的统计图形。 seaborn中的绘图功能可以理解熊猫对象，并在内部利用熊猫分组操作来支持复杂可视化的简洁规范。 Seaborn还超越了matplotlib和pandas的选择，可以在绘制图表时进行统计估计，汇总观察结果并可视化统计模型的拟合以强调数据集中的模式。

trans-unit.source: Series : when DataFrame.agg is called with a single function
trans-unit.target: 系列:当调用DataFrame.egg时,只需一个函数即可。

trans-unit.source: Series and Index are equipped with a set of string processing methods that make it easy to operate on each element of the array. Perhaps most importantly, these methods exclude missing/NA values automatically. These are accessed via the str attribute and generally have names matching the equivalent (scalar) built-in string methods:
trans-unit.target: Series和Index配备了一组字符串处理方法，这些方法使您可以轻松地对数组的每个元素进行操作。也许最重要的是，这些方法会自动排除丢失/ NA值。这些可以通过 str 属性访问，并且通常具有与等效的（标量）内置字符串方法匹配的名称：

trans-unit.source: Series are instantiated with dtype=float64 by default. While numpy.ndarray.view() will return a view with the same data type as the original array, Series.view() (without specified dtype) will try using float64 and may fail if the original data type size in bytes is not the same.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用 dtype=float64 实例化系列。虽然 numpy.ndarray.view() 将返回与原始数组具有相同数据类型的视图，但是 Series.view() （未指定dtype）将尝试使用 float64 ，并且如果原始数据类型的大小（以字节为单位）不是相同。

trans-unit.source: Series clipping element-wise using an array of thresholds. threshold should be the same length as the Series.
trans-unit.target: 使用阈值数组逐元素裁剪。 threshold 应与系列相同。

trans-unit.source: Specific to orient='table', if a DataFrame with a literal Index name of index gets written with to_json(), the subsequent read operation will incorrectly set the Index name to None. This is because index is also used by DataFrame.to_json() to denote a missing Index name, and the subsequent read_json() operation cannot distinguish between the two. The same limitation is encountered with a MultiIndex and any names beginning with 'level_'.
trans-unit.target: 具体到 orient='table' ，如果一个 DataFrame 与文字 Index 的名称 index 获取与写入 to_json() ,随后的读出操作将不正确设置的 Index 名称 None 。这是因为 index 也被 DataFrame.to_json() 来表示一个丢失 Index 名称，和随后的 read_json() 操作不能在两者之间进行区分。 MultiIndex 和以。开头的任何名称都遇到相同的限制 'level_' 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the compression library to be used. As of v0.20.2 these additional compressors for Blosc are supported (default if no compressor specified: ‘blosc:blosclz’): {‘blosc:blosclz’, ‘blosc:lz4’, ‘blosc:lz4hc’, ‘blosc:snappy’, ‘blosc:zlib’, ‘blosc:zstd’}. Specifying a compression library which is not available issues a ValueError.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的压缩库。从v0.20.2开始，支持这些Blosc附加压缩器（如果未指定压缩器，则默认为：'blosc：blosclz'）：{'blosc：blosclz'，'blosc：lz4'，'blosc：lz4hc'，'blosc：snappy' ，“ blosc：zlib”，“ blosc：zstd”}。指定不可用的压缩库会发出ValueError。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the labels for the returned bins. Must be the same length as the resulting bins. If False, returns only integer indicators of the bins. This affects the type of the output container (see below). This argument is ignored when bins is an IntervalIndex.
trans-unit.target: 指定返回的垃圾箱的标签。必须与生成的垃圾箱长度相同。如果为False，则仅返回垃圾箱的整数指示符。这会影响输出容器的类型（请参见下文）。当 bins 是IntervalIndex 时，将忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the one-based bottommost row and rightmost column that is to be frozen.
trans-unit.target: 指定要冻结的一基最底行和最右列。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether or not whitespace (e.g. ' ' or '    ') will be used as the sep. Equivalent to setting sep='\s+'. If this option is set to True, nothing should be passed in for the delimiter parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否将空格（例如 ' ' 或 '    ' ）用作分隔符。等效于设置 sep='\s+' 。如果将此选项设置为True，则不应该为 delimiter 参数传递任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether or not whitespace (e.g. ' ' or '\t') will be used as the delimiter. Equivalent to setting sep='\s+'. If this option is set to True, nothing should be passed in for the delimiter parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否将空格（例如 ' ' 或 '\t' ）用作分隔符。等效于设置 sep='\s+' 。如果此选项设置为 True ，则不应该为 delimiter 参数传递任何内容。

trans-unit.target: 指定C引擎应将哪个转换器用于浮点值。对于普通转换器，选项为 None 对于高精度转换器，选项为 high 对于往返转换器， round_trip 为round_trip。

trans-unit.source: Specify a date parse order if arg is str or its list-likes. If True, parses dates with the day first, eg 10/11/12 is parsed as 2012-11-10. Warning: dayfirst=True is not strict, but will prefer to parse with day first (this is a known bug, based on dateutil behavior).
trans-unit.target: 如果 arg 是str或类似列表，则指定日期解析顺序。如果为True，则将日期解析为第一天，例如12/10/11解析为2012-11-10。警告：dayfirst = True并不严格，但更喜欢使用day first进行解析（这是一个已知的错误，基于dateutil的行为）。

trans-unit.target: 指定比较精度。仅当check_exact为False时使用。比较小数点后的5位数(False)或3位数(True)。如果是int,则指定比较的位数。

trans-unit.source: Specify comparison precision. Only used when check_exact is False. 5 digits (False) or 3 digits (True) after decimal points are compared. If int, then specify the digits to compare.

trans-unit.target: 根据半衰期指定衰减，\（\ alpha = 1-exp（log（0.5）/ halflife），\ text {for} halflife> 0 \）。

trans-unit.source: Specify the dtype to control how datetime-aware data is represented. Use dtype=object to return an ndarray of pandas Timestamp objects, each with the correct tz.
trans-unit.target: 指定 dtype 以控制如何表示可识别日期时间的数据。使用 dtype=object 返回一个熊猫 Timestamp 对象的ndarray ，每个对象都具有正确的 tz 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the dtype (especially useful for integers with missing values). Notice that while pandas is forced to store the data as floating point, the database supports nullable integers. When fetching the data with Python, we get back integer scalars.
trans-unit.target: 指定dtype(对于有缺失值的整数特别有用)。注意,虽然pandas被迫将数据存储为浮点,但数据库支持可空的整数。当用Python获取数据时,我们得到的是整数标量。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to the skipna parameter, min_count handles all-NA and empty series identically.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了 skipna 参数， min_count 可以完全处理all-NA和空序列。

trans-unit.source: The “order” argument is ignored, is for compatibility with NumPy.

trans-unit.source: The “orientation” of the data. If the keys of the input correspond to column labels, pass ‘columns’ (default). Otherwise if the keys correspond to the index, pass ‘index’.
trans-unit.target: 数据的“方向”。如果输入的键与列标签相对应，请传递“列”（默认）。否则，如果键对应于索引，则传递“ index”。

trans-unit.source: The ‘krogh’, ‘piecewise_polynomial’, ‘spline’, ‘pchip’ and ‘akima’ methods are wrappers around the respective SciPy implementations of similar names. These use the actual numerical values of the index. For more information on their behavior, see the SciPy documentation and SciPy tutorial.
trans-unit.target: “ krogh”，“ piecewise_polynomial”，“ spline”，“ pchip”和“ akima”方法是类似名称的相应SciPy实现的包装。这些使用索引的实际数值。有关其行为的更多信息，请参见SciPy文档和SciPy教程。

trans-unit.source: The query() method uses a slightly modified Python syntax by default. For example, the & and | (bitwise) operators have the precedence of their boolean cousins, and and or. This is syntactically valid Python, however the semantics are different.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， query() 方法使用经过稍微修改的Python语法。例如， & 和 | （按位）运算符具有其布尔表亲 and 和 or 的优先级。这在语法上是有效的Python，但是语义不同。

trans-unit.source: The pandas.api.extensions.ExtensionDtype and pandas.api.extensions.ExtensionArray APIs are new and experimental. They may change between versions without warning.
trans-unit.target: 该 pandas.api.extensions.ExtensionDtype 和 pandas.api.extensions.ExtensionArray API是新的和实验。它们可能会在版本之间更改而不会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: The concat() function (in the main pandas namespace) does all of the heavy lifting of performing concatenation operations along an axis while performing optional set logic (union or intersection) of the indexes (if any) on the other axes. Note that I say “if any” because there is only a single possible axis of concatenation for Series.
trans-unit.target: 所述 concat() 函数（在主大熊猫命名空间）执行所有沿轴线进行级联的操作，而在其他轴进行索引的可选的一组逻辑（集或交集）（如果有的话）的繁重的。请注意，我之所以说“如有”，是因为Series只有一个可能的串联轴。

trans-unit.source: The MultiIndex object is the hierarchical analogue of the standard Index object which typically stores the axis labels in pandas objects. You can think of MultiIndex as an array of tuples where each tuple is unique. A MultiIndex can be created from a list of arrays (using MultiIndex.from_arrays()), an array of tuples (using MultiIndex.from_tuples()), a crossed set of iterables (using MultiIndex.from_product()), or a DataFrame (using MultiIndex.from_frame()). The Index constructor will attempt to return a MultiIndex when it is passed a list of tuples. The following examples demonstrate different ways to initialize MultiIndexes.
trans-unit.target: 的 MultiIndex 对象是标准的分级类似物 Index ，其典型地存储在大熊猫对象轴标签对象。您可以将 MultiIndex 视为一个元组数组，其中每个元组都是唯一的。阿 MultiIndex 可以从阵列的列表来创建（使用 MultiIndex.from_arrays() ),元组的阵列（使用 MultiIndex.from_tuples() ），一个交叉组iterables（使用的 MultiIndex.from_product() ），或一个 DataFrame （使用 MultiIndex.from_frame() ）。该 Index 构造函数将试图返回一个 MultiIndex 当它传递一个元组列表时。以下示例演示了初始化MultiIndexes的不同方法。

trans-unit.source: The DataFrame.index and DataFrame.columns attributes of the DataFrame instance are placed in the query namespace by default, which allows you to treat both the index and columns of the frame as a column in the frame. The identifier index is used for the frame index; you can also use the name of the index to identify it in a query. Please note that Python keywords may not be used as identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， DataFrame 实例的 DataFrame.index 和 DataFrame.columns 属性位于查询名称空间中，这使您可以将框架的索引和列都视为框架中的列。标识符 index 用于帧索引；您还可以使用索引名称在查询中进行标识。请注意，Python关键字不能用作标识符。

trans-unit.source: The %F directive is the same as %Y if the frequency is not quarterly. Otherwise, it corresponds to the ‘fiscal’ year, as defined by the qyear attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在 %F 指令相同 %Y 如果频率不季报。否则，它对应于 qyear 属性定义的“财政年度” 。

trans-unit.source: The %U and %W directives are only used in calculations when the day of the week and the year are specified.
trans-unit.target: 在 %U 和 %W 指令指定了一周，一年中的一天，只是用于计算。

trans-unit.source: The %f directive is the same as %y if the frequency is not quarterly. Otherwise, it corresponds to the ‘fiscal’ year, as defined by the qyear attribute.
trans-unit.target: 的 %f 指令是相同的 %y 如果频率不季度。否则，它对应于 qyear 属性定义的“财政年度” 。

trans-unit.source: The %p directive only affects the output hour field if the %I directive is used to parse the hour.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 %I 指令用于解析小时时， %p 指令才会影响输出小时字段。

trans-unit.source: The –recursive flag can be passed to sort all files in a directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 –recursive 标志可以传递到目录中的所有文件进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The + symbol indicates that the true memory usage could be higher, because pandas does not count the memory used by values in columns with dtype=object.
trans-unit.target: 的 + 符号表示真正的内存使用情况可能更高，因为熊猫不计算使用的值列在与所述存储器 dtype=object 。
